author: Jose
text: I ordered a pair of shoes they got confirmed on the 17th then 2 days later didn't shipped, I contacted StockX then told be they got confirmed the following day and so I had to wait yet another day and they told me that if the seller didn't shipped them they would line me up with another seller. the seller never shipped them and they didn't even asked me if I wanted my money back or the shoes , they just refunded me. I wanted the shoes. the person who helped me was bad at customer service (Tati).
title: I ordered a pair of shoes they got…

author: Patricio
text:
Good but it can go even further.

The product was great, verified, and everything. However, the packaging was damaged. The information about the shipment could improve, even more, letting the buyer know when arrives at StockX and when it leaves, giving a better experience for the customer.

The box was in ok condition, nothing to complain about that.
title: Good but it can go even further.

author: Parker
text: I have now been waiting weeks for my shoes and have no idea if/when they might arrive. If they do ever actually arrive or not, I will never buy another pair using StockX.
